About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

To add a little extra to my 3-month intense coding bootcamp at Spiced Academy I startet my studies of media computer science (Medieninformatik) at Beuth University this October.

Building websites for clients is what I love to do and where I want to improve my skillset. Working with a digital agency to where I can apply my knowledge and gain new experiences is my big goal!

I love all things digital, am open-minded, curious and empathic and would love to support your agency with my enthusiasm and my skills. If I am not coding or studying I enjoy being in nature with my two dogs Lucy and Wanja.

Web Development

Front End Development | WordPress

The Frontend is where my heart goes. With a good understanding of HTML5 & CSS3 and Javascript I want to build stunning websites! Lots of them! I can build from scratch as well as using frameworks like ReactJS, VueJS or the awesome pagebuilder Elementor.

Web Design

Webflow | Photoshop | InDesign | Adobe XD

I am teaching myself tools I havent learned at SPICED Academy to improve my skillset to become a Designer who can Code / a Developer who can Design!

With Dogs

Lucy & Wanja

My buddies who keep me happy and responsible. Two extraordinarily well-behaved sweet pups who would love to sleep under my desk while coding.
